segments.text: I’m quite taken aback by the sheer quantity of water flowing from that sink.

segments.text: It's just cascading over the edge, creating a truly impressive and messy puddle.

segments.text: The water is streaming down the cabinet doors, saturating the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene makes me feel a bit uneasy, especially with all the potential damage.

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, just running without purpose onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, still drying her plate, seems completely oblivious to this flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is absolute, a stark contrast to the spreading liquid around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really dislike seeing such preventable mess in a kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of having to clean all that up is truly unpleasant.

segments.text: This situation is escalating quietly, but the consequences will be loud.
